text: @piersmorgan @FT FT fig are guess work, & the word >related< to Cov-19 is used a lot.. does that mean if someone was hit by a 32 ton truck & had 3 wks to live but died within 2 wks of Covid-19 he is then reg as a >related< to Cov-19 death?
